TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImportManager extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The ImportManager class is used to import individual TermSet instances into a Group.

remarks.para: The data for the import is specified in a *.csv that must follow a well known format.This class can be retrieved from the method .This is a useful class for bootstrapping a TermStore with individual term sets, but for more complex data it is recommended that the writable APIs for Group, TermSet and Term be used to import data.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BatchSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.BatchSize : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the batch size of each commit operation.
Docs.value: An integer indicating the batch size of each commit operation

remarks.para: When the method executes, it imports multiple objects into a object. The BatchSize value determines how often to commit (save) these items. For example, if the BatchSize value is 1000 then the changes will be committed after each1000 terms are imported.
The default value of this property is 1000. This property should be set prior to calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.SharePoint.Taxonomy.TermSet ImportTermSet (Microsoft.SharePoint.Taxonomy.Group parentGroup, System.IO.TextReader reader, out bool allTermsAdded, out string errorMessage);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.SharePoint.Taxonomy.TermSet ImportTermSet(class Microsoft.SharePoint.Taxonomy.Group parentGroup, class System.IO.TextReader reader, [out] bool& allTermsAdded, [out] string& errorMessage) cil managed
Public Function ImportTermSet (parentGroup As Group, reader As TextReader, ByRef allTermsAdded As Boolean, ByRef errorMessage As String) As TermSet

public: Microsoft::SharePoint::Taxonomy::TermSet ^ ImportTermSet(Microsoft::SharePoint::Taxonomy::Group ^ parentGroup, System::IO::TextReader ^ reader, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % allTermsAdded, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % errorMessage);

Docs.param: A object to be the parent group of the term set.
TextReader for a .csv file containing term set data
A Boolean output parameter indicating whether all terms were added
A string output parameter indicating all error messages occuring during the import operation
Docs.summary: Imports a object into the from a .csv file.
Docs.returns: A object generated from the input data

remarks.para: When this method returns, the output parameter is set to true if true if all terms in the .csv file are added; otherwise, false.

When this method returns, the output parameter will be empty if there were no errors during the import. If there were errors during the import, the parameter contains information about all of the errors that occurred.
The parameter value cannot be the system group.The .csv file opened by the parameter should adhere to standard .csv file format.

Docs.exception: is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic)
Creating a term set in system Group is disallowed.
The term set .csv import file does not adhere to the correct format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TermStore As TermStore

Docs.summary: Gets the object in which to import.
Docs.value: The term store in which to import
